revisions.revision: Fixed up the layout, mapped out some values..
Plugin getting close to complete. A little more effort and we will be there.

plugin.comment: While represented as an enum, it is actually an index to the "HUD Shaders" block in CHGD.
Only select the "Inherited" sort layer for a Bitmap or Text Widget, otherwise the game will crash.
These will only function with the placement anchor value set to a grenade one.

Things to note about them: -Only 1 condition needs to match per flags for the game to count it. Split the flags between the parent and bitmap/text widgets to get around this. -Unit and Weapon sections only resolve on HUDs referenced by that particulat object type. -Impulse fields mean the widget is always invisible by default, but play a specific animation if a match occurs, then becomes invisible again. -The Flash section means the widget is always visible by default, but play a specific animation if a match occurs. -Hidden State means if any flags in it resolve to true then the widget stays active but becomes hidden -Every other field should behave as an on/off switch for whether or not the widget should be drawn.

Shader type selects type of chud shader to render with External Inputs are how widgets get game values. Custom values are a palette of values to optionally supply as outputs Output values are what actually pipes into the shader. you can output external or custom values

bit.name: Auto Permute
bit.tooltip: offset sequence index by biped type

bit.name: Scale Alpha By Col. Out A

tagblock.name: Text Widgets
tagblock.comment: Fonts use a dumb jump table that creates a custom font ordering for the HUD. The number in brackets is the proper engine order index from the fontpackage file.

This value can be anything from the hud_messages unicode tag, or one of the following, where a-f correspond to Output Scalars a-f in the Render Data block: chud_out_a chud_out_b chud_out_c chud_out_d chud_out_e chud_out_f chud_variant_name chud_talking_player_name chud_arming_meter_name chud_time_left chud_training_text chud_campaign_objective_text
